channel.title: emms on SqrtMinusOne
channel.description: Recent content in emms on SqrtMinusOne

item.title: My EMMS and elfeed setup
item.description: Intro This is the current state of my quest to live in Emacs, at least in part of reading RSS and music. Even before I lost my mind about customizing obscure keyboard-driven software, I tried Inoreader, self-hosted FreshRSS, and then newsboat from the RSS side and ncmpcpp+MPD from the audio player side. At some point, I got curious about whether I can do the same in Emacs. The respective emacs packages, elfeed and EMMS, proved somewhat tricky to set up, i.
